text.text: Hey everyone, my name's Jace
speaker: Jace

text.text: and I'm the Community Manager at Coffee Stain Studios,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and today's the last video before
speaker: Jace

text.text: Update 4 is released on March 16th
speaker: Jace

text.text: - this Tuesday, only a few days away
speaker: Jace

text.text: - 5pm GMT,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and I'm just making a video to let you know that
speaker: Jace

text.text: we're going to be doing a special stream for that,
speaker: Jace

text.text: starting at 1pm GMT.
speaker: Jace

text.text: We normally stream on our twitch channel
speaker: Jace

text.text: - twitch.tv/coffeestainstudiosdevs
speaker: Jace

text.text: - but we will also be streaming here on YouTube,
speaker: Jace

text.text: because it's a special occasion.
speaker: Jace

text.text: So starting at 1pm GMT,
speaker: Jace

text: we're gonna be- we gotta bunch of guests
speaker: Jace

text.text: we're gonna do the Community Highlights that we normally do,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and we'll be doing some other fun stuff,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and then we're going to count down to the launch of the Update,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and we're gonna play a video for you all.
speaker: Jace

text.text: And you know last year when we did this,
speaker: Jace

text.text: we played the Update 3 Trailer video,
speaker: Jace

text.text: this time we're actually gonna be playing
speaker: Jace

text.text: the Update 4 Patch Notes video instead of the trailer
speaker: Jace

text.text: - we're gonna save the Trailer for
speaker: Jace

text.text: when the Early Access version is done,
speaker: Jace

text.text: so when the version is
speaker: Jace

text.text: - when Update 4 is done and released to everybody,
speaker: Jace

text.text: so we're gonna do the Patch Notes video.
speaker: Jace

text.text: And if you haven't seen our Patch Notes videos before,
speaker: Jace

text.text: I'll leave a link in the cards above to the Update 3 one.
speaker: Jace

text.text: We tend to go so over the top,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and make them really fun and entertaining.
speaker: Jace

text.text: So I'm sure you'll all enjoy that as well.
speaker: Jace

text.text: So between now and then however,
speaker: Jace

text.text: I have also compiled a playlist
speaker: Jace

text.text: of all of the Update 4-related things
speaker: Jace

text.text: and news that has been released,
speaker: Jace

text.text: so again, in the cards up here you can check out that playlist
speaker: Jace

text.text: if you want to catch up or refresh yourself on all the news
speaker: Jace

text.text: for Update 4 before Update 4 drops, if you want.
speaker: Jace

text.text: Last thing I just want to say is that
speaker: Jace

text.text: starting on Wednesday- so the day after Update 4 drops-
speaker: Jace

text.text: I'm going on just sort of an extended break
speaker: Jace

text.text: - an extended vacation - from work,
speaker: Jace

text.text: so I will be gone for a while,
speaker: Jace

text.text: but Snutt will be holding the fort of course.
speaker: Jace

text.text: So take care of yourselves while I'm gone,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and I'll see you when I get back.
speaker: Jace

text.text: Yeah, so that's all- I hope you have a lovely weekend,
speaker: Jace

text.text: and I will catch you all on Tuesday- hopefully-
speaker: Jace

text.text: otherwise I'll see you whenever.
speaker: Jace

text.text: Bye!
speaker: Jace
